title: Dell's 24-inch FreeSync gaming monitor is currently on sale for $130 at Best Buy — almost $200 off the original price
text:
FreeSync technology can make for a more immersive gaming experience because it reduces artifacts.

For a limited time, the Dell 24-inch FreeSync gaming monitor is available for a very affordable $129.99 — which is a whopping $190 off its normal price.

We're not sure how long the deal will last, so it's worth acting quick if you're interested.

FreeSync can help make gaming feel more immersive by reducing motion artifacts and offering smoother play, but many FreeSync monitors are still a little pricey. Now, however, you can get a pretty decent one for under $130 thanks to this new deal from Best Buy for a Dell 24-inch full HD monitor.

The deal actually puts the monitor at under half price — normally it comes at an already relatively affordable $319.99, but with the deal, you'll save a whopping $190.

There are a number of things that make this monitor such a great option. For starters, it supports a full HD (1,920 x 1,080) resolution with up to a hefty 144 Hz refresh rate. It also offers two USB ports, two HDMI ports, and a DisplayPort — which is a nice selection for various gaming systems and accessories.

As mentioned, the monitor also comes with FreeSync, which is an adaptive display technology that matches the refresh rate of the display with the frame rate of your graphics hard — reducing screen tearing and other artifacts and making for a much more immersive experience.

In general, the display should offer a pretty good image quality, too. Colors will be bright and vivid, with a decent level of contrast for those darker scenes.
description: Dell makes some of the best computer monitors for a variety of functions. The Dell FreeSync gaming Monitor is currently on sale for $130 at Best Buy.
